comments.raw_text:
Woot!

I hereby proclaim that anyone presenting a printout of this comment, in or at an establishment where I am present, is entitled to 1 Free Beer of your choice. Valid until bug 8000000, limit 1 per person, must be of legal drinking age. Offer may be revoked at any time but I really really really would like to buy you some tasty beers.

Especially if you and I can have one of these:

http://www.ratebeer.com/RateBeerBest/bestbeers_012011.asp

comments.text: I propose we change the title of this bug to "Buy Firefox developers some Alcoholic Beverages" - some of us are booze hounds ya know
comments.raw_text: I propose we change the title of this bug to "Buy Firefox developers some Alcoholic Beverages" - some of us are booze hounds ya know

ddahl: that sounds like a followup bug. Bug 800000 is coming, y'know? ;)

In any case, I could likely be convinced to exchange a One Free Beer for a One Free Cocktail. Offer void for Appletinis, Cosmopolitians, etc. Must cite pre-prohibition reference for redemption.

joduinn: Guinness is always acceptable, and is assumed to be on any top-N list. Especially when served nitro-style.
